data: <col=08088A>An <col=8A0808>Ultimate Iron Man<col=08088A> does not receive items
<col=08088A>They <u>cannot</u> trade, stake, receive PK loot, scavenge dropped
<col=08088A>In addition to the standard Iron Man rules,
<col=08088A>an <col=8A0808>Ultimate Iron Man<col=08088A> <u>cannot use banks</u><col=08088A>, <u>nor retain any
<col=08088A>You will start with a <col=8A0808>training sword<col=08088A> and <col=8A0808>shield<col=08088A>.
